currentReleasableAmount().details: Returns the current releasable token amount of the vesting

isCliffPassed().details: Returns whether the cliff period has passed

releasedAmount().details: Returns the amount of tokens that has been released to the beneficial address.

remainingAmount().details: Returns the remaining token amount of the overall vesting

totalAmount().details: Returns the total amount of tokens that will be released over the entire vesting period.
